Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7246 affecting package grpc for versions less than 1.62.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7246 affecting package grpc for versions less than 1.62.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package grpc is earlier than 1.62.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-7246
